summary: ONGOING PROBLEMS WITH FRONT DISC ROTORS.  ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT ROTORS WARPED AND HAD TO BE TURNED SEVERAL TIMES.  REPLACED AT 125000 MILES (2002) WITH HONDA PARTS AND THE  NEW ROTORS HAD TO BE TURNED AFTER 2000 MILES.  NOW ABOUT 6000 MILES LATER THEY ARE  BADLY WARPED AGAIN.  STOPPING DISTANCE IS SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASED WHEN THE ROTORS  ARE THIS BADLY WARPED.   *JB
